product_name: Sugoi MidZero Bib Bike Tights - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Train outdoors even on cold days in the men's Sugoi MidZero Bib Bike Tights. Their fleecey, high-performance thermal lining keeps you warm without letting you overheat. MidZero fabric has a brushed inner layer which expedites moisture wicking and increases air flow, trapping body warmth next to skin. RC Pro chamois has a quick-drying top surface and anatomically placed gel cushioning. Sugoi MidZero Bib Bike Tights for men have 7-in. ankle zippers. Flat seams for increased comfort. Closeout.
short_description: Train outdoors even on cold days in the men's Sugoi MidZero Bib Bike Tights. Their fleecey, high-performance thermal lining keeps you warm without letting you overheat.
